name: Context7
description: Fetch up-to-date, version-specific documentation and code examples directly into your prompts. Enhance your coding experience by eliminating outdated information and hallucinated APIs. Simply add `use context7` to your questions for accurate and relevant answers.

name: Ref
description:
Provide your AI coding tools with token-efficient access to up-to-date technical documentation for APIs, services, libraries, and more. Enable powerful search and reading capabilities to help your agent find precise information from documentation and web pages. 

Learn more:  https://ref.tools

How is this different from Context7?
- Context7 works by looking up a library and giving you the 10k most relevant tokens. If you have 2 libraries, that's 20k tokens etc. It's unlikely you need all of that and it's costly. Ref uses on average 60% fewer tokens and up to 95% fewer (eg 500 tokens instead of 10000) in some cases.
- Ref supports indexing private GitHub repos and PDFs so you can bring your own context as well.

Want to chat or have a feature request?
- Reach out to hello@ref.tools and say hi!

name: Aurora Documentation
description:
A complete and continuously updated knowledge base for the Aurora ecosystem, this MCP enables developers to build on Aurora and Virtual Chains by providing technical guidance, structured documentation, configuration support, integration assistance, and troubleshooting resources. Optimized for AI agents, tools, and builders, it offers seamless access to the core capabilities of Aurora’s infrastructure through a clear and searchable interface.

Aurora is a next-generation blockchain infrastructure designed to support high-performance, customizable virtual chains. These virtual chains are fully interoperable blockchains that run as smart contracts on top of the NEAR Protocol, offering developers scalability, modularity, and fine-grained control over execution and economics. Built to abstract away complexity, virtual chains enable faster development, smoother integration, and a more agent-friendly architecture for on-chain applications.

Features

- Full coverage of Solana launchpads

Available Data (& Growing)

- Advanced search across DeFi protocols
